channel.title: BBC News
channel.description: Feed from BBC News - with images and summaries

item.title: Lord Mandelson arrested on suspicion of misconduct in public office
item.description:
The Metropolitan Police says a 72-year-old man has been taken to a London police station for interview following the arrest in Camden.

item.title: First British baby born using transplanted womb from deceased donor
item.description:
Grace Bell, who was born without a viable womb, says her little boy is "simply a miracle".

item.title: Mexico sends thousands of soldiers to stop violence after death of drug lord
item.description:
A wave of violence has erupted across Mexico since a powerful drug cartel boss died following his capture by special forces.
